column1: Little Goat Diner////Went for brunch today. Complete disappointment. Japanese pancake was off putting mix of textures and flavors
column2: lacking unity and structure. Had to use hot sauce to make it somewhat enjoyable. Potato hash was browned well
column3: but tasted of burnt oil. I expect better kitchen upkeep than cooking with burnt oil at 830AM on a Sunday morning. Waiter was nice
column4: but recommending the potato hash as an accompaniment for a solo diner was ridiculous. That plate can feed three to four people as a side. Probably won't be back.
